alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 12 at 3:22AM HST until March 12 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .Strong winds will continue over the higher elevations on the Big Island through the afternoon hours, then decrease through the overnight hours. Summit wind speeds will fall below warning levels by tonight. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 45 to 55 mph with localized gusts over 65 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
